Package src.service

Class ManagerApplicantApprovalService

java.lang.Object
src.service.ManagerApplicantApprovalService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManagerApplicantApprovalService
public class ManagerApplicantApprovalService extends Object implements IManagerApplicantApprovalService
Provides services for HDB managers to review, approve/reject applicant submissions, and handle applicant withdrawal requests for their projects.
